forecast-period.text: Cloudy. High chance of showers. Winds southeasterly 15 to 25 km/h tending southerly 15 to 20 km/h in the evening.

Partly cloudy. Medium chance of showers, most likely in the early afternoon. Winds southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h tending southerly 15 to 25 km/h in the morning then increasing to 25 to 35 km/h in the middle of the day.
Moderate
Sun protection 9:10am to 4:10pm, UV Index predicted to reach 8 [Very High]
Sunny. Winds south to southwesterly 15 to 25 km/h turning southeasterly in the middle of the day then becoming light in the evening.
Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a shower. Winds north to northwesterly 15 to 20 km/h tending north to northeasterly 15 to 25 km/h during the day then becoming light during the evening.
Mostly sunny morning. Medium chance of showers, most likely in the afternoon and evening. Winds west to northwesterly 15 to 20 km/h shifting southerly 25 to 35 km/h during the day.
Partly cloudy. Medium chance of showers. Winds southerly 25 to 35 km/h tending southwesterly 15 to 25 km/h later.
Partly cloudy. Medium chance of showers. Winds southwesterly 20 to 30 km/h turning south to southeasterly 25 to 35 km/h during the day.
Partly cloudy. Medium chance of showers. Winds southwesterly 15 to 25 km/h turning southerly 20 to 30 km/h during the morning.

Moderate
